src:
Sistem Lama Dianggap Usang, Kemenkumham Usung Pengaduan Online Kekayaan Intelektual
04 Nov 2019, 21:26 by Alfreds Tuter


Sistem Lama Dianggap Usang, Kemenkumham Usung Pengaduan Online Kekayaan Intelektual

KBRN, Jakarta: Direktorat Jenderal Kekayaan Intelektual (DJKI) menilai Sistem pengaduan pelanggaran dan pelayanan kekayaan intelektual yang ada sekarang, berbasis surat menyurat dinilai kurang efektif dan efisien.
Melihat permasalahan itu, akhirnya DJKI  meluncurkan layanan E-Pengaduan berbasis online terkait pelanggaran dan pelayanan kekayaan intelektual. Langkah ini agar memudahkan masyarakat sekaligus mengajak masyarakat aktif menciptakan iklim berkreasi dan berinovasi yang kondusif.
"Membangun aplikasi “Pengaduan KI Online” yang dapat diakses di E -pengaduan.dgip.go.id.," ucap Menkumham Yasonna H. Laoly dalam sambutannya di pembukaan acara peluncuran Pengaduan KI Online di Hotel JW Marriott, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
"Jangan sampai nanti sudah diambil oleh negara lain baru kita bingung. Nanti reog bukan lagi reog Ponorogo tapi jadi reog kuala lumpur," tambahnya.
Satu Rangkaian Rapat Kerja Teknis 
Acara peluncuran pengaduan online ini merupakan bagian dari Rapat Kerja Teknis Pelayanan Kekayaan Intelektual bagi Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan HAM (Kemenkumham) terhitung mulai 4 hingga 7 November 2019 di tempat yang sama. 
Adapun menurut Direktur Jenderal Kekayaan Intelektual, Freddy Harris tujuan rapat ini guna meningkatkan kinerja Direktorat Jenderal Kekayaan Intelektual yang terkait dengan tugas, pokok dan fungsi (TUPOKSI) serta kesesuaian suatu program dan kegiatan yang dilakukan terkait program KI yang di bawah Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan HAM.
"Diperlukan adanya pembinaan dan koordinasi antara DJKI dengan Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan HAM guna mencapai kinerja yang optimal," ujar Direktur Jenderal Kekayaan Intelektual, Freddy Harris, dalam laporannya kepada Menteri Hukum dan HAM, Yasonna H. Laoly.
Sebagai informasi, digitalisasi memang telah menjadi fokus DJKI untuk mewujudkan semangat menjadi The Best IP Office in the World.  Selama beberapa tahun terakhir, DJKI terus berinovasi di bidang infrastruktur, pengembangan sumber daya manusia dan sistem informasi teknologi guna terciptanya pelindungan kekayaan intelektual yang lebih baik.
DJKI memahami bahwa kekayaan intelektual memiliki peran sangat penting dalam menunjang perkembangan perekonomian dan perdagangan baik di pusat maupun di daerah karena kaitannya yang erat dengan dunia perdagangan dan investasi Indonesia.
text:
The Old System Is Considered Outdated, Kemenkumham Uphold Online Complaints of Intellectual Property
Nov 04 2019, 21:26 by Alfreds Tuter


The Old System Is Considered Outdated, Kemenkumham Uphold Online Complaints of Intellectual Property

KBRN, Jakarta: The Directorate General of Intellectual Property (DJKI) assesses that the existing system for complaints of violations and intellectual property services, based on correspondence is deemed ineffective and inefficient.
Seeing the problem, finally DJKI launched an online-based E-Complaints service related to violations and intellectual property services. This step is to facilitate the community and at the same time encourage the community to actively create a conducive climate of creation and innovation.
"Building the application" Online KI Complaints "which can be accessed at E-Complaints.dgip.go.id. 11/2019).
"Do not let it have been taken by other countries then we are confused. Later reog will no longer reog Ponorogo but will become reog kuala lumpur," he added.
A Series of Technical Work Meetings
The launching of this online complaint was part of the Technical Working Meeting on Intellectual Property Services for the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights (Kemenkumham) from 4 to 7 November 2019 in the same place.
According to the Director General of Intellectual Property, Freddy Harris, the purpose of this meeting was to improve the performance of the Directorate General of Intellectual Property related to the duties, principal and functions (TUPOKSI) as well as the suitability of a program and activities carried out related to the IP program under the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights .
"There is a need for coaching and coordination between DJKI and the Regional Office of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights to achieve optimal performance," said Director General of Intellectual Property, Freddy Harris, in his report to the Minister of Justice and Human Rights, Yasonna H. Laoly.
For information, digitalization has indeed been the focus of DJKI to realize the spirit of being the Best IP Office in the World. Over the past few years, the DJKI has continued to innovate in infrastructure, human resource development and technology information systems to better protect intellectual property.
DJKI understands that intellectual property has a very important role in supporting economic and trade development both at the center and in the regions because of its close relationship with the world of trade and investment in Indonesia.
